message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about $11,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,500 for the product.
